item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
The Hirdvaettir are the personal guards of a Jarl and the elites of the Jarldom. Equipped with heavy armors adopted from Jotun and human models they are expected to never falter and defend their Jarl at all costs. While braver than their kin, the Hirdvaettir are not brave by human standards.
